metadata.title: CVE-2020-24332 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - negligible
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in TrouSerS through 0.3.14. If the tcsd daemon isstarted with root privileges, the creation of the system.data file is proneto symlink attacks. The tss user can be used to create or corrupt existingfiles, which could possibly lead to a DoS attack.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-24332` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libtspi1 - 0.3.15-0.3
trousers - 0.3.15-0.3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: trousers package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.3.15-0.3').
